content: This should be my third-last PR to Mathlib3. I'm slightly concerned the rising tide of the port will reach its shores so I'd be very grateful for any attention people can give to it.

Could you comment on https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib/pull/17985/files#diff-e3318ae8a7a1ecccacb6241a1946e0e7f19cb3a433f1e82f0bd6e7dac58d4159R664 and similar changes? Are you weakening the assumption?
Yes, I'm weakening the assumption and thus strengthening the lemma.
(and I'm doing it because I need the stronger lemma somewhere)
In the series union_ae_eq_univ_of_ae_eq_univ_left etc, do I understand correctly you are using _ to replace a single alpha?
Oh, indeed I am. I'll fix that. I was just used to this from situations where the type was not just a single character.
